Project Description
 
If you're looking for a completely native look and feel for calendars in your WPF projects which supports Persian calendar besides the Gregorian and etc, you'll love this library.

This is just the WPFToolkit project which changed to support persian calendar.

History
I always like the native & clear look for custom controls which we create. While we need a full series of Persian calendar components for our WPF projects, I didn't find any appropriate component.

But suddenly I faced with a blog1 which introduced a very good implementation of such components. The author (Mohammadreza) has changed the SilverlightToolkit to support the Persian calendar as Gregorian. It's great, but it isn't WPF. Thanks to Mohammadrezaâ€™s idea I started to do such work on WPFToolkit. With due respect I surprised for some dirty and hasty implementation (However it's a great implementation overall).

You can find more about this project author at www.dev-frame.com.
